item.title: "Israel is a country that does not fear outside critics because it manufactures its own critics in i...
item.description:
ğŸ¦ @TimesofIsrael

"Israel is a country that does not fear outside critics because it manufactures its own critics in industrial quantities, funds their newsrooms, protects their legal right to publish, and tolerates their conclusions," Adil Faouzi writes. Adil Faouzi is a Moroccan journalist with a Master's degree in Media Studies from Qatar. He writes about the Western Sahara dispute, Morocco-Israeli relations, and Jewish-Muslim coexistence. *Please note that the posts on The Blogs are contributed by third par
